property.value: Cody R Discard 1 momentum: After you block with this card, your opponent commits X foundations in their staging area. X equals your opponent's momentum.

property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up).E: If this attack deals damage, each player takes 1 card from their momentum and adds it to their hand and your opponent commits 1 of their foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you play a Stun attack, take X cards from your discard pile and add them to your momentum. X equals the attack's Stun rating. You may not play the attack's Stun ability this turn.
